alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lenoir; Northern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jones, Greene, Lenoir, west central Craven and southwestern Pitt Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Institute, or near La Grange, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kinston, La Grange, Grifton, Snow Hill, Dawson, Maury, Ormondsville, Graingers, Institute, Jason, Lizzie, Kinston Regional Jetport, Hookerton, Dover, Sandy Bottom, Castoria, Shine, Fort Run VFD and Bull Head VFD. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
